doc:
Benny Rubin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Benny_Rubin 0 Benny Rubin (February 2, 1899 – July 15, 1986) was a Jewish American comedian and film actor. Born in Boston, Massachusetts, Rubin made more than 200 radio, film and television appearances over a span of 50 years, to include an appearance on I Dream of Jeannie, the episode title “The Case of My Vanishing Master." Benny_Rubin ( February_2_,_1899 – July_15_,_1986 ) was a_Jewish_American_comedian_and_film_actor .
